message.content: {"id": "21706", "title": "Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage", "description": "Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage ", "OB": "The BidiUtil class in win32 has Class.forName() usage.", "EB": "A private constructor should be added to the BidiUtil class. Since there are no nonstatic methods in this class, it is recommended to make the constructor private. This will prevent people from instantiating the class when there is no need to do so. Adding a private constructor does not increase the size because the compiler provides a free public constructor by default.", "SR": "Replace the line above with: 'static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), \"windowProc\", 4);'. While I haven't tested it, this change should provide the same functionality."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '21706', 'title': 'Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage', 'description': 'Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "add a private constructor.There are no nonstatic methods in this class, soactually, this would be a good thing to do anyway.Might as well preventpeople from instantiating the class if there's no need to.You're not addingany size, because the compiler gives you a free public constructor anyway.You're just making the contructor private instead of public. ", 'SR': 'change the line above to:static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);I haven\'t tested it, but it should do exactly the same thing. '}
